info.title: Dermatology EHR API
info.description: Comprehensive API documentation for the Dermatology EHR system

get.description: Retrieve appointments with optional filters for patient, date, or date range (limited to 200).

post.description: Create a new appointment. Checks for provider time conflicts. Requires admin, front_desk, ma, or provider role.
Change the date/time and optionally the provider for an existing appointment. Checks for time conflicts. Requires admin, front_desk, or ma role.
Change an appointment's status. Triggers waitlist auto-fill when status is 'cancelled'. Requires admin, front_desk, ma, or provider role.
Authenticate a user with email and password. Returns user info and JWT tokens.

400.description: Missing tenant header or validation error

post.description: Use a refresh token to obtain a new access token and refresh token.

get.description: Retrieve the currently authenticated user's information.
Retrieve all users for the current tenant.
Retrieve encounters for the current tenant (limited to 50, ordered by creation date).

post.description: Create a new encounter (clinical visit documentation). Requires provider, ma, or admin role.

get.description: Returns a simple health status of the API.
Returns comprehensive health information including database, memory, CPU, and disk status.
Retrieve all locations for the current tenant, sorted by name.
Search for medications with optional filters for category and controlled status (limited to 50).

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, generic name, or brand name

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.description: Retrieve a single medication's detailed information.
Retrieve a list of patients for the current tenant (limited to 50).

post.description: Create a new patient record. Requires admin, ma, front_desk, or provider role.

get.description: Retrieve a single patient's detailed information by ID.

put.description: Update an existing patient's information. Requires admin, ma, front_desk, or provider role.

400.description: Validation error or no fields to update

delete.description: Delete a patient and all associated records (appointments, encounters, documents, etc.). Admin only.

get.description: Retrieve all providers for the current tenant, sorted by full name.
Retrieve vital signs records, optionally filtered by patient ID (limited to 200, ordered by recorded date).
